content:
# We successfully harvested 10 units of stone! Now that we have coal, iron ore, and stone in our inventory, we can proceed to craft a stone furnace.

# Let's attempt to craft the stone furnace now that we have the necessary materials.
craft_item(Prototype.StoneFurnace)  # Craft one stone furnace.
print(f"Inventory changed to {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check inventory after crafting.
